meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a superorganic entity or process.
meanings.sent1: The superorganic world of technology continues to evolve rapidly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the superorganic elements present in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a superorganic robot taking over the world is both fascinating and terrifying.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a superorganic computer, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The superorganic glow of the neon lights lit up the night sky.
